mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_feed where status = "Y"
mapper.insert: insert into tb_feed ( feed_no , mem_no , feed_title , feed_contents , feed_date , feed_status ) values( seq_fno.nextval , 1 , #{feedTitle} , #{feedContent} , sysdate , default )
mapper.delete: update tb_feed set feed_status = 'N' where feed_no = #{feedNo}
update tb_reply set reply_status = 'N' where reply_no = #{replyNo}
